pets

Class Panda

  • java.lang.Object
    • pets.Pet
      • pets.Panda

  • public class Panda
extends Pet
    Describes the panda subclass

        private static final float weightRange
        Average weight of a panda. The constructor will create a panda with a weight within 20% of this value
